patientdoctorwebsockets

Class Hospitalman

  • java.lang.Object
    • patientdoctorwebsockets.Hospitalman

  • public class Hospitalman
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles network requests to the hospital backend.

        Returns:
        the AuthResponse object representing the response from the server

      • auth

        public AuthResponse auth(AuthModel auth_model)
        Authenticates the hospital server login.
        Parameters:
        auth_model - The authentication model containing the necessary credentials.
        Returns:
        The AuthResponse object representing authentication response from the server.

      • authWebSocket

        public boolean authWebSocket(okhttp3.WebSocketListener webSocketListener)
        Authenticates the WebSocket connection.
        Parameters:
        webSocketListener - The WebSocket listener to handle events.
        Returns:
        True if the WebSocket connection is successfully authenticated, false otherwise.

      • getSessionId

        public java.lang.String getSessionId()
        Retrieves the session ID associated with the hospital client.
        Returns:
        The session ID as a String.

      • authWebSocket

        public boolean authWebSocket(okhttp3.WebSocketListener webSocketListener,
                             java.lang.String session_id)
        Authenticates the WebSocket connection with the provided session ID.
        Parameters:
        webSocketListener - The WebSocket listener to handle events.
        session_id - The session ID to authenticate the WebSocket connection.
        Returns:
        True if the WebSocket connection was successfully authenticated, false otherwise.

      • findOnlineDoc

        public void findOnlineDoc()
        Finds online doctors. This method looks for any online doctor. creates a chat model and sets the command to "get_online" and the message to "consultant". It then converts the chat model to a JSON string and sends it to the hospital websocket server.

      • findOnlineDoc

        public void findOnlineDoc(java.lang.String speciality)
        Finds online doctors based on the specified specialty.
        Parameters:
        speciality - The specialty of the doctors to search for.

      • getAppointments

        public void getAppointments()
        Retrieves the appointments from the server based on the consultant speciality. This method creates a chat model, sets the command to "get_appointments", and sets a dummy message as consultant. The chat model is then converted to a JSON string. The JSON string is sent to the server using the hospital_Client.wsSend() method.

      • getRecords

        public void getRecords()
        Retrieves the records from the server. This method creates a chat model, sets the command to "get_records", and sets a dummy message. The chat model is then converted to a JSON string. Finally, the JSON string is sent to the server using the hospital_Client.wsSend() method.

      • getPrescriptions

        public void getPrescriptions()
        Retrieves the prescriptions from the server. This method creates a chat model, sets the command to "get_prescriptions", and sets a dummy message. It then converts the model to a JSON string and sends it to the hospital client for further processing.

      • getChatHistory

        public void getChatHistory()
        Retrieves the chat history from the server. This method creates a chat model, sets the command to "get_chats", and sets a dummy message. The chat model is then converted to a JSON string. The JSON string is sent to the server using the hospital_Client.wsSend() method.

      • makeAppointment

        public void makeAppointment(long appointment_date,
                            java.time.LocalTime appointment_time)
        Makes an appointment with the current user specified appointment date and time.
        Parameters:
        appointment_date - The date of the appointment.
        appointment_time - The time of the appointment.

      • makeAppointment

        public void makeAppointment(java.lang.String doc_chat_uuid,
                            java.lang.String appointment_note,
                            long appointment_date,
                            java.time.LocalTime appointment_time)
        Makes an appointment with a doctor based on the chat uuid.
        Parameters:
        doc_chat_uuid - The UUID of the doctor's chat.
        appointment_note - The note for the appointment.
        appointment_date - The date of the appointment.
        appointment_time - The time of the appointment.

        medicine_name - The name of the medicine.
        medicine_dose - The dose of the medicine.

        test_personel - The name of the personnel conducting the lab test.

        Parameters:

        med_quantity - The quantity of the medication to order.
        pharma_id - The ID of the pharmacy to order from.
